texts.content: {"text":"1. (Bu) Allohdan va Uning Rasulidan \nmushriklarning siz ahdlashganlaringizga \n«baroat» — ora ochiqligi (e'loni)dir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,115]}]}

{"text":"2. Bas, yer yuzida to`rt oy sayr qilib yuringlar va bilinglarki, albatta, siz Allohni ojiz qoldiruvchi emassiz va, albatta, Alloh kofirlarni xor qilguvchidir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,158]}]}

{"text":"3. (Bu) Alloh va Uning Rasulidan odamlarga \n«hajjul akbar» kunidagi bildirishdir. Albatta, Alloh va Uning Rasulining mushriklar bilan oralari ochiqdir. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,152]}]}

{"text":"Bas, agar tavba qilsangiz, u o`zingiz uchun yaxshidir. Agar yuz o`girib ketadigan bo`lsangiz, bilinglarki, albatta, sizlar Allohni ojiz qoldiruvchi emassiz. Kufr keltirganlarga alamli azobning «bashoratini» beraver.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,215]}]}

{"text":"4. Magar mushriklardan siz ahdlashganingizdan \nkeyin hech narsani nuqson qilmaganlari va sizga qarshi birovga yordam bermaganlarining ahdlarini muddatlarigacha batamom qiling. \nAlbatta, Alloh taqvodorlarni sevadir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,214]}]}

{"text":"5. Bas, harom oylar chiqqanda, mushriklarni \nqayerda topsangiz, o`ldiringlar, tutinglar, \nqamal qilinglar va ularni har joyda poylanglar. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,138]}]}

{"text":"Agar tavba qilsalar, namozni to`kis ado etsalar va zakotni bersalar, yo`llariga qo`yib yuboringlar. \nAlbatta, Alloh mag`firatli va rahimli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,146]}]}

{"text":"6. Agar mushriklardan birontasi panoh so`rasa, \nunga panoh ber, toki u, Allohning kalomini eshitsin. \nSo`ngra, uni omonlik joyiga yetkazib qo`y. Bu, ularning bilmaydigan qavm bo`lganlari uchundir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,196]}]}

{"text":"7. Qanday qilib mushriklarga Allohning 
huzurida va Uning Rasulining huzurida ahd bo`lsin?! Magar siz bilan Masjidul Harom oldida ahdlashganlar, sizga nisbatan mudom mustaqiym tursalar, 
siz ham mustaqiym turing. Albatta, 
Alloh taqvodorlarni sevadir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,251]}]}

{"text":"8. Qanday qilib (ularga ahd bo`lsinki), ular agar sizdan ustun kelsalar, na ahdga va na burchga rioya etmaslar. Sizni og`izlari bilan rozi qiladilar-u, \nqalblari ko`nmas. Ularning ko`plari fosiqlardir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,201]}]}

{"text":"9. Ular Allohning oyatlarini ozgina bahoga sotib, \nUning yo`lidan to`sdilar. Darhaqiqat, ularning qilganlari qanday ham yomon bo`ldi?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,134]}]}

{"text":"10. Ular mo`min haqida na ahdga va na burchga rioya qilmaslar. Ana o`shalar, o`zlari tajovuzkorlardir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,102]}]}

{"text":"11. Bas, agar tavba qilsalar, namozni to`kis ado etsalar va zakotni bersalar, din qardoshingizdirlar. Biladigan qavm uchun oyatlarimizni batafsil bayon qilamiz.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,160]}]}

{"text":"12. Agar ahd berganlaridan keyin ahdlarini buzsalar va diningizga ta'na toshini otsalar, kufrboshilarga qarshi jang qiling! Zero, ularning ahdlari yo`qdir. Shoyadki, to`xtasalar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,178]}]}

{"text":"13. Ahdlarini buzgan, Rasulni (yurtdan) chiqarishga qasd qilgan va sizga (qarshi) birinchi bo`lib (urush) boshlagan qavm bilan urushmaysizmi?! Ulardan \nqo`rqasizmi?! Agar mo`min bo`lsangiz, \nqo`rqishingizga loyiq zot Allohdir!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,226]}]}

{"text":"14. Ularga qarshi jang qilinglar! Alloh ularni sizning \nqo`lingiz bilan azoblaydir, xorlaydir va ularga qarshi sizga yordam beradir. Va mo`min qavmlarning \nko`ngillariga shifo beradir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,184]}]}

{"text":"15. Va qalblaridagi achchiqni ketkazadir. \nAlloh kimni xohlasa, o`shaning tavbasini qabul qiladir. Alloh bilguvchi va hikmatli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,134]}]}

{"text":"16. Sizdan jihod qilganlarni, Allohdan, \nUning Rasulidan va mo`minlardan o`zgani \ndo`st tutmaganlarni bilmay turib, Alloh tomonidan tark etib qo`yilmog`ingizni o`yladingizmi? Alloh nima qilayotganlaringizdan xabardor Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,224]}]}

{"text":"17. Mushriklarga, o`zlarining kofir ekanliklariga guvoh bo`lgan hollarida, Allohning masjidlarini obod qilishlari joiz emas. Ana o`shalar amallari habata \nbo`lganlardir va ular do`zaxda abadiy qoluvchilardir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,208]}]}

{"text":"18. Albatta, Allohning masjidlarini faqat Allohga va oxirat kuniga iymon keltirganlar, namozni to`kis ado etganlar, zakotni berganlar va Allohdan boshqadan qo`rqmaganlargina obod qilurlar. Ajab emaski, \nana o`shalar hidoyat topguvchilardan bo`lsalar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,250]}]}

{"text":"19. Hojilarga suv berishni va Masjidul Haromni obod qilishni Allohga, oxirat kuniga iymon keltirgan va Allohning yo`lida jihod qilgan kabi qildingizmi?! \nUlar Allohning huzurida teng emaslar. Alloh zolim qavmlarni hidoyat qilmas.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,229]}]}

{"text":"20. Iymon keltirib, hijrat qilganlar va Allohning yo`lida mollari va jonlari bilan jiddu jahd qilganlarning darajalari Allohning huzurida juda ulug`dir. \nAna o`shalar yutuqqa erishuvchilardir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,192]}]}

{"text":"21. Robbilari ularga O`z tarafidan bo`lgan rahmat, rozilik va ichida ularga atalgan doimiy ne'matlar bor jannatlarning bashoratini beradir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,139]}]}

{"text":"22. Ular unda abadiy qoluvchilardir. \nAlbatta, Alloh — huzurida ulug` ajr bor Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,85]}]}

{"text":"23. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! Agar kufrni iymondan 
ustun ko`rsalar, ota-onangiz va aka-ukalaringizni 
do`st tutmang. Sizdan kim ularni do`st tutsa, 
bas, ana o`shalar, o`zlari zolimlardir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,187]}]}

{"text":"24. «Agar ota-onalaringiz, bolalaringiz, \naka-ukalaringiz, juftlaringiz, qarindosh-urug`laringiz, kasb qilgan mollaringiz, kasod bo`lishdan \nqo`rqqan tijoratlaringiz va xush ko`rgan maskanlaringiz sizga Allohdan,","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,212]}]}

{"text":" Uning Rasuli va Uning yo`lida jiddu jahd 
qilishdan mahbubroq bo`lsa, u holda, 
Alloh O`z amrini keltirguncha kutib turing. 
Alloh fosiq qavmni hidoyat qilmas», – deb ayt.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,172]}]}

{"text":"25. Batahqiq, Alloh sizlarga ko`p joylarda nusrat berdi. Hunayn kunida ham. O`shanda sizni ko`pligingiz 
mag`rur qilgan edi. Bas, sizga hech foyda bermadi 
va keng yer sizga torlik qilib qoldi. 
So`ngra, ortga qarab qochdingiz.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,227]}]}

{"text":"26. So`ngra, Alloh sokinligini Payg`ambariga va \nmo`minlarga tushirdi hamda siz ko`rmaydigan lashkarlarni tushirdi va kufr keltirganlarni azobladi. Ana o`sha, kofirlarning jazosidir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,182]}]}

{"text":"27. So`ngra, o`shandan keyin Alloh \nO`zi xohlagan kishilarning tavbasini qabul qildi. \nAlloh mag`firatli va rahimli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,123]}]}

{"text":"28. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! \nAlbatta, mushriklar najasdirlar, bunga shubha yo`q, bu yillaridan keyin Masjidul Haromga yaqin kelmasinlar. Agar faqirlikdan qo`rqsangiz, Alloh, \nO`zi xohlasa, sizni tezda fazli ila boy qilib qo`yadir. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,231]}]}

{"text":"Albatta, Alloh bilguvchi va hikmatli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,44]}]}

{"text":"29. Allohga va oxirat kuniga iymon keltirmaydiganlarga, Alloh va Uning Rasuli harom qilgan narsalarni harom deb bilmaydigan va haq dinga yurmaydigan","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,148]}]}

{"text":" kitob berilganlarga qarshi, \nto ular bo`yinsungan hollarida o`z qo`llari bilan \n«jizya» bermagunicha, jang qiling.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,115]}]}

{"text":"30. Yahudiylar: «Uzayr Allohning o`g`lidir», – dedilar. Nasorolar: «Masiyh Allohning o`g`lidir», – dedilar. \nBu og`izlari bilan aytgan gaplaridir. \nAvvalgi kufr keltirganlarning gapiga o`xshaturlar. Alloh ularni la'natlasin. Qayon burilmoqdalar?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,246]}]}

{"text":"31. Ular Allohni qo`yib o`zlarining hibr va rohiblarini hamda Masiyh ibn Maryamni Robb tutdilar. Ular faqat bitta ilohdan boshqaga ibodat qilmaslikka amr qilingan edilar. Undan o`zga ibodatga sazovor zot \nyo`q. U zot ular shirk keltirayotgan narsadan pokdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,258]}]}

{"text":"32. Ular Allohning nurini og`izlari bilan o`chirmoqchi bo`lurlar. Alloh esa, garchi kofirlar yoqtirmasa ham, \nO`z nurini batamom qilishdan boshqa har narsadan bosh tortadir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,173]}]}

{"text":"33. U, garchi mushriklar yoqtirmasa ham, \nO`z Rasulini hidoyat va haq din bilan uni hamma dindan ustun qilish uchun yuborgan Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,132]}]}

{"text":"34. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! Albatta, \nhibr va rohiblarning ko`plari ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,68]}]}

{"text":"odamlarning mollarini botil yo`l bilan yerlar va Allohning yo`lidan to`sarlar. Oltin va kumushni xazinaga bosadigan, Allohning yo`lida sarflamaydiganlarga alamli azobning \nbashoratini beraver.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,192]}]}

{"text":"35. Bir kuni o`sha(oltin-kumush)larni jahannam \no`tida qizitilur va peshonalari, yonboshlari hamda orqalariga bosilib: «Mana bu o`zingiz uchun \nto`plagan narsangiz, bas, endi to`plab yurgan narsangizni tatib ko`ring!» – deyilur.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,228]}]}

{"text":"36. Albatta, Allohning kitobida oylarning soni Allohning huzurida osmonlaru yerni yaratgan kuni \no`n ikki oy qilib belgilangan. Ulardan to`rttasi (urush qilish) harom (oylar)dir. Mana shu to`g`ri dindir. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,204]}]}

{"text":"U(oy)larda o`zingizga zulm qilmang. \nMushriklarga qarshi jam bo`lib, ular sizga qarshi jam bo`lib urushayotgandek, urush qiling. \nVa bilingki, albatta, Alloh taqvodorlar bilandir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,179]}]}

{"text":"37. Albatta, «nasiyu» kufrda ziyoda bo`lishdan 
o`zga narsa emas. Bu bilan kufr keltirganlar zalolatga ketkazilurlar. Alloh harom qilgan narsaning adadiga moslash uchun uni bir yil halol qilurlar, 
bir yil harom qilurlar. Bas, bu bilan Alloh harom 
qilgan narsani halol qilurlar.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,279]}]}

{"text":" Ularga amallarining yomonligi ziynatlandi. \nAlloh kofir qavmlarni hidoyat qilmas.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,82]}]}

{"text":"38. Ey, iymon keltirganlar! \nSizga nima bo`ldiki, Allohning yo`lida qo`zg`aling, deyilsa, yerga yopishib oldingiz. Yoki oxiratni qo`yib, dunyo hayotiga rozi bo`ldingizmi? Oxirat oldida bu dunyo hayoti juda oz-ku?!","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,213]}]}

{"text":"39. Agar qo`zg`almasangiz, sizni alamli azob bilan azoblaydir. O`rningizga boshqa qavmni keltiradir. \nSiz Unga zarar keltira olmassiz. \nAlloh har bir narsaga qodirdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,167]}]}

{"text":"40. Agar siz unga yordam bermasangiz, 
batahqiq, Alloh unga, kufr keltirganlar uni ikki kishining biri bo`lgan holida chiqarganlarida, nusrat berdi. 
Ular ikkovlon g`orda turganlarida, u sherigiga: 
«Xafa bo`lma, Alloh, albatta, biz bilan», dedi. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,247]}]}

{"text":"Bas, Alloh uning ustidan O`z sokinligini nozil qildi va siz ko`rmagan lashkarlar bilan qo`lladi. Kufr keltirganlar kalimasini past qildi. Allohning kalimasi esa, \no`zi yuqori. Alloh g`olib va hikmatli Zotdir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,208]}]}

{"text":"41. Yengil bo`lsa ham, og`ir bo`lsa ham, \nqo`zg`alingiz va Allohning yo`lida mollaringiz va jonlaringiz ila jiddu jahd qilingiz. Agar bilsangiz, \nshu ishingiz o`zingiz uchun yaxshidir.","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,184]}]}

{"text":"42. Agar oson manfaat va yaqin safar bo`lganida, albatta, senga ergashar edilar. \nLekin ularga masofa uzoq ko`rindi. ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[1,1,1]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/Poppins Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":8,"range":[0,117]}]}

{"text":"Ular tezda Alloh nomi bilan qasam ichib: \n«Agar qodir bo`lganimizda, albatta, siz bilan chiqar edik», – derlar. Ular o`zlarini halok qilurlar. {"text":"ٱنفِرُوا۟ خِفَافًۭا وَثِقَالًۭا وَجَٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِكُمْ وَأَنفُسِكُمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ \nذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,147]}]}

{"text":"لَوْ كَانَ عَرَضًۭا قَرِيبًۭا وَسَفَرًۭا قَاصِدًۭا لَّٱتَّبَعُوكَ وَلَٰكِنۢ بَعُدَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلشُّقَّةُ ۚ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,109]}]}

{"text":"وَسَيَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَوِ ٱسْتَطَعْنَا لَخَرَجْنَا مَعَكُمْ يُهْلِكُونَ أَنفُسَهُمْ \nوَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ إِنَّهُمْ لَكَٰذِبُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,131]}]}

{"text":"عَفَا ٱللَّهُ عَنكَ لِمَ أَذِنتَ لَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكَ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُوا۟ وَتَعْلَمَ ٱلْكَٰذِبِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,109]}]}

{"text":"لَا يَسْتَـْٔذِنُكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْءَاخِرِ أَن يُجَٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ \nوَأَنفُسِهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلْمُتَّقِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,159]}]}

{"text":"إِنَّمَا يَسْتَـْٔذِنُكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْءَاخِرِ \nوَٱرْتَابَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ فَهُمْ فِى رَيْبِهِمْ يَتَرَدَّدُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,146]}]}

{"text":" وَلَوْ أَرَادُوا۟ ٱلْخُرُوجَ لَأَعَدُّوا۟ لَهُۥ عُدَّةًۭ وَلَٰكِن كَرِهَ ٱللَّهُ ٱنۢبِعَاثَهُمْ فَثَبَّطَهُمْ \nوَقِيلَ ٱقْعُدُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْقَٰعِدِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,149]}]}

{"text":"لَوْ خَرَجُوا۟ فِيكُم مَّا زَادُوكُمْ إِلَّا خَبَالًۭا وَلَأَوْضَعُوا۟ خِلَٰلَكُمْ يَبْغُونَكُمُ ٱلْفِتْنَةَ \nوَفِيكُمْ سَمَّٰعُونَ لَهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,175]}]}

{"text":"لَقَدِ ٱبْتَغَوُا۟ ٱلْفِتْنَةَ مِن قَبْلُ وَقَلَّبُوا۟ لَكَ ٱلْأُمُورَ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَظَهَرَ \nأَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَهُمْ كَٰرِهُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,137]}]}

{"text":"إِن تُصِبْكَ حَسَنَةٌۭ تَسُؤْهُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُصِبْكَ مُصِيبَةٌۭ يَقُولُوا۟ قَدْ أَخَذْنَآ أَمْرَنَا مِن \nقَبْلُ وَيَتَوَلَّوا۟ وَّهُمْ فَرِحُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,143]}]}

{"text":"قُلْ هَلْ تَرَبَّصُونَ بِنَآ إِلَّآ إِحْدَى ٱلْحُسْنَيَيْنِ ۖ وَنَحْنُ نَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُمْ أَن يُصِيبَكُمُ \nٱللَّهُ بِعَذَابٍۢ مِّنْ عِندِهِۦٓ أَوْ بِأَيْدِينَا ۖ فَتَرَبَّصُوٓا۟ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّتَرَبِّصُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,210]}]}

{"text":"قُلْ أَنفِقُوا۟ طَوْعًا أَوْ كَرْهًۭا لَّن يُتَقَبَّلَ مِنكُمْ ۖ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًۭا فَٰسِقِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,102]}]}

{"text":" إِنَّمَا ٱلصَّدَقَٰتُ لِلْفُقَرَآءِ وَٱلْمَسَٰكِينِ وَٱلْعَٰمِلِينَ عَلَيْهَا وَٱلْمُؤَلَّفَةِ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَفِى ٱلرِّقَابِ\n وَٱلْغَٰرِمِينَ وَفِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱبْنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ ۖ فَرِيضَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,239]}]}

{"text":"وَمِنْهُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْذُونَ ٱلنَّبِىَّ وَيَقُولُونَ هُوَ أُذُنٌۭ ۚ قُلْ أُذُنُ خَيْرٍۢ لَّكُمْ يُؤْمِنُ بِٱل\nلَّهِ وَيُؤْمِنُ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَرَحْمَةٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمْ ۚ ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,190]}]}

{"text":"وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْذُونَ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,61]}]}

{"text":"يَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَكُمْ لِيُرْضُوكُمْ وَٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ أَحَقُّ أَن يُرْضُوهُ إِن كَانُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,113]}]}

{"text":"أَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُۥ مَن يُحَادِدِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَأَنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدًۭا فِيهَا ۚ\n ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخِزْىُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,142]}]}

{"text":"وَلَا تُصَلِّ عَلَىٰٓ أَحَدٍۢ مِّنْهُم مَّاتَ أَبَدًۭا وَلَا تَقُمْ عَلَىٰ قَبْرِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ \nكَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ فَٰسِقُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,160]}]}

{"text":"وَلَا تُعْجِبْكَ أَمْوَٰلُهُمْ وَأَوْلَٰدُهُمْ ۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُعَذِّبَهُم بِهَا فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا \nوَتَزْهَقَ أَنفُسُهُمْ وَهُمْ كَٰفِرُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,153]}]}

{"text":"يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ قَٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ يَلُونَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ وَلْيَجِدُوا۟ فِيكُمْ \nغِلْظَةًۭ ۚ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,165]}]}

{"text":"وَإِذَا مَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌۭ فَمِنْهُم مَّن يَقُولُ أَيُّكُمْ زَادَتْهُ هَٰذِهِۦٓ إِيمَٰنًۭا ۚ \nفَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ فَزَادَتْهُمْ إِيمَٰنًۭا وَهُمْ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,176]}]}

{"text":"وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ فَزَادَتْهُمْ رِجْسًا إِلَىٰ رِجْسِهِمْ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ كَٰفِرُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,111]}]}

{"text":"أَوَلَا يَرَوْنَ أَنَّهُمْ يُفْتَنُونَ فِى كُلِّ عَامٍۢ مَّرَّةً أَوْ مَرَّتَيْنِ ثُمَّ لَا يَتُوبُونَ وَلَا هُمْ يَذَّكَّرُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,127]}]}

{"text":"وَإِذَا مَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌۭ نَّظَرَ بَعْضُهُمْ إِلَىٰ بَعْضٍ هَلْ يَرَىٰكُم مِّنْ\n أَحَدٍۢ ثُمَّ ٱنصَرَفُوا۟ ۚ صَرَفَ ٱللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُم بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌۭ لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,177]}]}

{"text":"لَقَدْ جَآءَكُمْ رَسُولٌۭ مِّنْ أَنفُسِكُمْ عَزِيزٌ عَلَيْهِ مَا عَنِتُّمْ حَرِيصٌ \nعَلَيْكُم بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ رَءُوفٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,130]}]}

{"text":"فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَقُلْ حَسْبِىَ ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ ۖ وَهُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ","styles":[{"fill":{"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"color":[0.9843137264251709,0.80392158031463623,0.54901963472366333]}}},"font":{"path":"C:/Users/davro/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/Fonts/KFGQPC Uthman Taha Naskh Regular.ttf","id":""},"size":10,"useLetterColor":true,"range":[0,125]}]}
